item.Q:
Write the character:
to exceed; overtake; surpass; transcend; ultra-; super-; to pass; to cross
item.A:
chāo
超过 (超過) chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: side; edge; margin; border; boundary
2: suffix of a noun of locality
item.A:
traditional: 邊
1: biān 2: bian
一边 (一邊) yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while 外边 (外邊) wàibian (n) outside; (n) exterior surface; (n) place other than one's home town

item.Q:
Write the character:
make or cause to be; order; command; decree; honorable
item.A:
lìng
命令 mìnglìng (an) order or command

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: fake; false; artificial; to borrow; if; suppose
2: vacation
item.A:
1: jǐa 2: jìa
假定 jǐadìng to assume; to suppose 请假 (請假) qǐngjìa ask for time off

item.Q:
Write the character:
accurate; standard
item.A:
traditional: 準
zhǔn
准备 (準備) zhǔnbèi preparation; prepare

item.Q:
Write the character:
to go (in a direction); past; previous; towards
item.A:
wǎng
往往 wǎngwǎng often; frequently

item.Q:
Write the character:
to leave; to depart; to go away; from
item.A:
离 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 離
lí
距离 (距離) jùlí distance; to be apart

item.Q:
Write the character:
injure; injury; wound
item.A:
伤 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 傷
shāng
损伤 (損傷) sǔnshāng to harm; to damage; to injure; impairment; loss; disability

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: wait; treat; deal with; need; about; intending to do something
2: stay; delay
item.A:
1: dài 2: dāi
对待 (對待) duìdài treat; treatment 待命 dāimìng to await orders

item.Q:
Write the character:
to add; to attach; to be close to; to be attached
item.A:
fù
附近 fùjìn (in the) vicinity; nearby; neighboring; next to

item.A:
chāo
to exceed; overtake; surpass; transcend; ultra-; super-; to pass; to cross
